root.name: Portal
root.description: Portal is a text adventure (with a graphical interface) in which you take the role of an astronaut from a failed interstellar mission, returning to Earth 100 years later. The Earth is empty of humans, who seem to have disappeared without a trace. Finding a terminal to Homer, an artificially intelligent computer, you must trace through Homer's databases to piece together the narrative of what happened to the human race.A novel Portal: A Dataspace Retrieval by Rob Swigart (who also wrote the game) was published in 1988 and contained most of the text of the game as the player would experience it.
